name: Muscle Up
how_to_perform:
1. Start in a hanging position with your hands gripping an edge or bar for support.

2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine, ensuring that your body stays tight and stable throughout the movement.

3. Kick your legs up behind you and lift your body off the ground until you are almost perpendicular to the floor.

4. From this hanging leg raise position, slowly pull your body up, keeping it straight from head to heels.

5. As you ascend, focus on engaging your arms, shoulders, and core muscles to help you up. 

6. Pause briefly once you reach the top of the movement.

7. Slowly lower yourself back down using only your arm strength.
short_summary: The muscle-up is a pull-up variation that works multiple upper-body muscles in a single motion.
